description: This file defines a React functional component named CourseCard that displays a summarized card view of a course. It includes course image, title, description, instructor, progress percentage, and a CTA button linking to the course detail page.

methods.name: CourseCard({ course, ctaLabel = "Open Course" })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a visual card interface for a course, accepting course data and an optional CTA label.

ctags.name: CourseCard
ctags.pattern: /^export default function CourseCard({ course, ctaLabel = "Open Course" }) {$/
